metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3630 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An out-of-bounds write vulnerability was found in DjVuLibre in DJVU::DjVuTXT::decode() in DjVuText.cpp via a crafted djvu file which may lead to crash and segmentation fault. This flaw affects DjVuLibre versions prior to 3.5.28.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3630` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

djview - 3.5.27.1-8ubuntu0.4
djview3 - 3.5.27.1-8ubuntu0.4
djvulibre-bin - 3.5.27.1-8ubuntu0.4
djvulibre-desktop - 3.5.27.1-8ubuntu0.4
djvuserve - 3.5.27.1-8ubuntu0.4
libdjvulibre-text - 3.5.27.1-8ubuntu0.4
libdjvulibre21 - 3.5.27.1-8ubuntu0.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: djvulibre package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.27.1-8ubuntu0.4').
